services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: From initial concept to turnkey handover - we guide you through all project phases with the highest level of professionalism and years of experience.

generalContractor.title: General Contractor
generalContractor.description: As a reliable general contractor, we take complete responsibility for your construction project - from planning to turnkey handover.
generalContractor.longDescription: As an experienced general contractor, we offer you complete project management from a single source. From the initial planning phase to final handover, we coordinate all trades and guarantee you the highest quality, schedule and cost security.
generalContractor.detailedFeature1: Complete project management from a single source

planning.title: Planning & Architecture
planning.description: Innovative planning solutions that unite functionality, aesthetics and economy in perfect balance - for future-proof buildings.
planning.longDescription: Our experienced architects and planners develop innovative solutions that meet the highest aesthetic standards while being economical and functional. From initial sketch to detailed execution planning.
planning.detailedFeature2: Detailed technical planning of all trades

projectManagement.title: Project Management
projectManagement.description: Professional project management ensures smooth processes, optimal resource utilization and timely completion of your construction project.
projectManagement.longDescription: Through systematic project management and control, we ensure optimal processes, efficient resource utilization and timely realization of your construction project. Transparent communication and continuous monitoring are our standard.
projectManagement.detailedFeature3: Systematic quality control in all phases

process.title: Our Project Process
process.subtitle: A proven process for successful projects - from initial concept to turnkey handover.

step1.title: Consultation & Concept
step1.description: Analysis of your requirements and development of a customized concept.

step2.title: Planning & Approval
step2.description: Detailed planning and processing of all required approval procedures.

step3.title: Execution & Control
step3.description: Professional construction execution with continuous quality and schedule monitoring.

step4.title: Handover & Service
step4.description: Turnkey handover and comprehensive after-sales service.

industries.title: Our Industries
industries.subtitle: We realize projects in various sectors with industry-specific expertise.
industries.commercialDesc: Office buildings, shopping centers and business parks
industries.residentialDesc: Residential complexes, apartment buildings and urban districts
industries.industrialDesc: Production halls, logistics centers and industrial facilities
industries.infrastructureDesc: Transportation routes, bridges and public buildings

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most important questions about our services.
faq.q1: How long does a typical construction project take?
faq.a1: Project duration depends on size and complexity. Smaller projects take 6-12 months, larger projects 18-36 months. We create a detailed schedule for each project.
faq.q2: Do you offer a cost guarantee?
faq.a2: Yes, as a general contractor we offer you a binding cost guarantee after contract conclusion. Additional costs only arise from your change requests.
faq.a3: Our planning services include complete architectural and technical planning, 3D visualization, approval planning and coordination of all technical trades.
faq.q4: Do you also work outside Germany?
faq.a4: Currently we focus on projects in Germany, Austria and Switzerland. For international projects we work with proven partners.
faq.a5: We conduct regular quality controls throughout all construction phases. Additionally, we work with independent inspectors and are ISO 9001 certified.

cta.title: Ready for Your Project?
cta.subtitle: Let us realize your vision together. Contact us for a non-binding consultation.

meta.description: GRAVON Projektbau Services: General Contractor, Planning & Architecture, Project Management. Your partner for turnkey construction projects.

projects.title: Our References
projects.subtitle: Discover a selection of our successfully completed projects - each one proof of our competence and passion for excellent buildings.
projects.heroSubtitle: Over 200 successfully completed projects speak for our expertise and reliability.

stats.title: Our Track Record
stats.subtitle: Numbers that speak for themselves - an overview of our completed projects.

project1.title: Business Tower Frankfurt
project1.description: Pioneering office complex in the heart of the financial metropolis with sustainable architecture and state-of-the-art building technology.
project1.longDescription: The 20-story Business Tower Frankfurt combines state-of-the-art office technology with sustainable architecture. The building offers 15,000 m² of high-quality office space and has been certified to LEED Gold standard.
project1.fullDescription: The Business Tower Frankfurt is a pioneering project in the heart of the financial metropolis. With its sustainable architecture and state-of-the-art building technology, it sets new standards for ecological construction in urban spaces. The 20-story high-rise offers 15,000 m² of usable space with high-quality office space for international companies.
project1.challenge1: Integration of state-of-the-art smart building technology

project2.title: Residence Munich Maxvorstadt
project2.description: Exclusive residential complex in Munich's most sought-after location with 120 premium residential units and first-class amenities.
project2.longDescription: This luxurious residential complex in Munich's Maxvorstadt offers 120 exclusive apartments with upscale amenities. The project includes underground parking, wellness area and 24-hour concierge service.
project2.fullDescription: The Residence Munich Maxvorstadt is a luxury project in one of Munich's most desirable locations. The residential complex with 120 exclusive apartments combines classic Munich architecture with the most modern living comfort. Each apartment features high-quality amenities and spacious balconies or terraces.
project2.challenge3: Noise protection in central downtown location

project3.title: LogisticHub Hamburg
project3.description: State-of-the-art logistics center with fully automated warehouse technology and sustainable energy supply on 25,000 m².
project3.longDescription: LogisticHub Hamburg sets new standards in automated warehousing. On 25,000 m², the most modern technologies are used for CO2-neutral and highly efficient logistics processes.
project3.fullDescription: LogisticHub Hamburg is a milestone in modern logistics architecture. With fully automated warehouse technology and sustainable energy supply through solar systems and geothermal energy, the center achieves CO2 neutrality. The intelligent building technology optimizes all processes for maximum efficiency.

project4.title: Shopping Center Berlin
project4.description: Modern shopping center with innovative retail concept and entertainment area on 45,000 m².
project4.longDescription: A forward-looking shopping center in Berlin with innovative retail concepts, a large entertainment area and sustainable building technology.
project4.fullDescription: The Shopping Center Berlin combines retail, gastronomy and entertainment under one roof. With 45,000 m² of space, it offers room for over 150 shops, a multiplex cinema and a food court. The sustainable energy concept makes it one of the most environmentally friendly shopping centers in Germany.
project4.challenge2: Manage high visitor flows during construction phase

project5.title: Rhine Bridge Cologne
project5.description: New road and rail bridge over the Rhine with innovative engineering and sustainable materials.
project5.longDescription: A new combined road and rail bridge over the Rhine in Cologne, realized with innovative engineering and sustainable materials.
project5.fullDescription: The new Rhine Bridge Cologne is a masterpiece of modern engineering. The 1,200-meter-long bridge combines road and rail traffic and was realized with sustainable materials and innovative construction techniques. It significantly improves the region's transportation infrastructure.
project5.challenge1: Construction over one of Europe's busiest waterways

project6.title: Stuttgart Hospital New Building
project6.description: Ultra-modern hospital building with latest medical technology and patient-oriented architecture on 32,000 m².
project6.longDescription: A new hospital building in Stuttgart with state-of-the-art medical technology, patient-oriented architecture and energy-efficient building systems.
project6.fullDescription: The new building of Stuttgart Hospital sets new standards in hospital construction. On 32,000 m², modern treatment rooms, operating theaters and patient rooms were created. The architecture is oriented to the needs of patients and staff, while state-of-the-art medical technology was integrated.
project6.challenge1: Hygiene requirements in all construction phases
project6.challenge2: Complex technical infrastructure for medical technology

meta.description: GRAVON Projektbau References: Over 200 successfully completed projects in commercial, residential, industrial and infrastructure construction.

about.title: About GRAVON
about.heroSubtitle: For over 25 years your partner for demanding construction projects - with passion, expertise and innovation.
about.paragraph1: For over 25 years, GRAVON Projektbau has stood for the highest quality, reliability and innovation in construction. As a leading general contractor, we have successfully completed over 200 demanding projects.
about.paragraph2: Our interdisciplinary team of experienced architects, engineers and project managers works closely with our clients to develop customized solutions that are both functional and aesthetically convincing.
about.paragraph3: Sustainability and innovation are at the heart of our work. We consistently rely on the latest construction technologies, environmentally friendly materials and energy-efficient solutions for future-proof buildings.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: In 1998, Dr. Michael Gravon and his team founded GRAVON Projektbau with the vision of realizing construction projects at the highest level. What began as a small planning office in Frankfurt developed over the years into one of Germany's leading general contractors.
story.paragraph2: The key to our success lies in the combination of traditional craftsmanship and innovative technologies. We have always oriented ourselves to the latest developments while never losing sight of our core values - quality, reliability and customer proximity.
story.paragraph3: Today we employ over 50 qualified employees at three locations and have realized a construction volume of over 500 million euros. Our projects shape the cityscape of German metropolises and set standards for sustainable construction.

timeline.founded: Foundation of GRAVON Projektbau in Frankfurt
timeline.today: Over 200 projects and 500 million € construction volume

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Here you can learn how we handle your data.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content1: We are pleased about your interest in our company. The protection of your personal data is very important to us. In this privacy policy, we inform you about the processing of personal data when using our website.
intro.content2: Personal data is any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person.

website.title: Website Visit
website.content: When visiting our website, information is automatically sent to the server of our website. This information is temporarily stored in a so-called log file.

contact.title: Contact Form
contact.content: When using our contact form, we collect personal data only to the extent that you voluntarily provide it to us.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device.

access.title: Right of Access
access.content: You have the right to obtain information about the data stored about you.

correction.title: Right of Rectification
correction.content: You have the right to have incorrect data corrected.

deletion.title: Right of Erasure
deletion.content: You have the right to deletion of your personal data.

objection.title: Right to Object
objection.content: You have the right to object to the processing of your data.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about data protection, you can contact our data protection officer at any time:

meta.description: Privacy Policy of GRAVON Projektbau - Information on how we handle your personal data.

imprint.title: Legal Notice
imprint.subtitle: Legal information about GRAVON Projektbau GmbH according to § 5 TMG.

content.title: Liability for Content
content.text1: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages according to general laws in accordance with § 7 para. 1 TMG.
content.text2: According to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, however, we as a service provider are not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information under all circumstances.

links.title: Liability for Links
links.text1: Our offer contains links to external third-party websites over whose content we have no influence.
links.text2: Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for these external contents.

copyright.title: Copyright
copyright.text1: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law.
copyright.text2: Duplication, processing, distribution and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright require the written consent of the respective author or creator.

dispute.title: Dispute Resolution
dispute.content: We are not willing or obligated to participate in dispute resolution procedures before a consumer arbitration board.

legalContact.title: Contact for Legal Questions
legalContact.content: For legal questions and concerns, please contact:

meta.description: Legal Notice of GRAVON Projektbau - Legal information and contact details of the company.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.subtitle: Our terms and conditions for construction and planning services.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content1: These General Terms and Conditions (GTC) apply to all contracts for construction and planning services by GRAVON Projektbau GmbH.
intro.content2: Deviating conditions of the client only become effective if we expressly agree to them in writing.

scope.title: Scope of Application
scope.paragraph1: These GTC apply to all services of GRAVON Projektbau GmbH in the areas of general contracting, planning and project management.
scope.paragraph2: They also apply to future business relationships without us having to refer to them separately.
scope.paragraph3: Changes and additions to these GTC require written form.

contract.title: Contract Conclusion
contract.paragraph1: The contract is concluded through our written offer and its written acceptance by the client.
contract.paragraph2: Project execution takes place in the following phases:

payment.title: Prices and Payment
payment.paragraph1: Our prices are exclusive of statutory VAT.
payment.paragraph2: Payment is due within 14 days of invoicing without deduction.

deadlines.title: Deadlines and Time Limits
deadlines.paragraph1: Agreed deadlines are only binding if they are expressly designated as such.
deadlines.paragraph2: Delays due to force majeure or unforeseeable circumstances are not our responsibility.
deadlines.paragraph3: In case of delay, we are entitled to request a reasonable extension of time.

warranty.title: Warranty
warranty.paragraph1: We warrant our services in accordance with legal provisions.
warranty.paragraph2: Warranty periods depend on the type of service provided:

liability.title: Liability
liability.paragraph1: Our liability for damages is limited to intent and gross negligence.
liability.paragraph2: In case of slight negligence, we are only liable for breach of essential contractual obligations.
liability.paragraph3: Liability is limited in amount to typical and foreseeable damages.

final.title: Final Provisions
final.law: German law applies excluding the UN Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods.
final.court: Place of jurisdiction is Frankfurt am Main.
final.severability: Should individual provisions be invalid, the validity of the remaining contract remains unaffected.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about these GTC, please contact:

meta.description: General Terms and Conditions of GRAVON Projektbau for construction and planning services.
